original_text:
He is torn from the tent in which he trusted
    and is brought to the king of terrors.
korean_text: 그가 의지하던 것들이 장막에서 뽑히며 그는 공포의 왕에게로 잡혀가고

sentences.original_text: He is torn from the tent in which he trusted
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기가 믿었던 장막에서 찢겨 나간다

sentences.original_text: and is brought to the king of terrors.
